H0.text: Who was the lyre-playing muse of tragedy in Greek mythology. Calliope

H3.text: Who was the lyre-playing muse of tragedy in Greek mythology. Melpom√®ne

A4.text: Depictions of Melpomene may include a tragic mask, buskins, lyres, scrolls, and a crown of leaves.

A5.text: Melpomene is the Muse of tragedy in Greek mythology.
